name: 施青良
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
Course Schedule 2011 Semester II
Week 1: 	Orientation
Week 2: 	Unit 6. Global Connections: Reading
Week 3:	Unit 6. Global Connections: Reading
Week 4:	Unit 7. Language and Communication: Listening/Speaking
Week 5:	Unit 7. Language and Communication: Reading
Week 6:	Unit 7. Language and Communication: Reading
Week 7:	Review
Week 8:	Class midterm exam	 期中考
Week 9:	Proficiency Test	 會考
Week 10:	Unit 8. Tastes and Preferences: Listening/Speaking
Week 11:	Unit 8. Tastes and Preferences: Reading
Week 12:	Unit 9. New Frontiers: Listening/Speaking
Week 13:	Unit 9. New Frontiers: Reading
Week 14:	Unit 10. Ceremonies: Listening/Speaking
Week 15:	Unit 10. Ceremonies: Reading
Week16:	Review
Week 17:	Class Final Exam	期末考
Week 18:	Proficiency Test	會考
scorePolicy:
兩次會考 30%
課堂練習 34%
演講與討論 36%
